tasks.name: Define Business Need
tasks.description: Clearly articulate the business problem or opportunity that the project aims to address
tasks.ruDescription: Четкое определение бизнес-проблемы или возможности, на решение которой направлен проект
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Business need is clearly defined and agreed upon by key stakeholders

tasks.name: Stakeholder Mapping
tasks.description: Identify and analyze stakeholders, their interests, and influence on the project
tasks.ruDescription: Выявление и анализ заинтересованных сторон, их интересов и влияния на проект
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Stakeholder map is complete and includes influence/interest assessment

tasks.name: High-level AS-IS Sketch
tasks.description: Create a high-level view of the current process or system
tasks.ruDescription: Создание общего представления о текущем процессе или системе
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: AS-IS sketch covers all major activities and pain points

tasks.name: Initial Risk Register
tasks.description: Identify initial project risks and mitigation strategies
tasks.ruDescription: Выявление начальных рисков проекта и стратегий их снижения
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Top 5-10 risks identified with mitigation plans

tasks.name: Business Case Lite
tasks.description: Create a simple business case justifying the project
tasks.ruDescription: Создание упрощенного бизнес-обоснования проекта
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Business case includes costs, benefits, and high-level ROI

tasks.name: Regulatory Scan
tasks.description: Identify relevant regulations and compliance requirements
tasks.ruDescription: Выявление соответствующих нормативных требований и требований соответствия
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: All applicable regulations identified and documented

tasks.name: Initial Success Metrics
tasks.description: Define metrics to measure project success
tasks.ruDescription: Определение метрик для измерения успеха проекта
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: SMART metrics defined and baseline established

tasks.name: Story-Mapping Workshop
tasks.description: Conduct a workshop to map user stories and create a product backlog
tasks.ruDescription: Проведение семинара для картирования пользовательских историй и создания бэклога продукта
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: User story map created with prioritized stories

tasks.name: Prioritise MVP Backlog
tasks.description: Prioritize backlog items for the MVP
tasks.ruDescription: Расстановка приоритетов элементов бэклога для MVP
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Backlog prioritized using agreed criteria (value, cost, risk)

tasks.name: Refine Requirements
tasks.description: Detail requirements for high-priority features
tasks.ruDescription: Детализация требований для высокоприоритетных функций
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Requirements specified in enough detail for development

tasks.name: UX Wireframes
tasks.description: Create wireframes for key user interfaces
tasks.ruDescription: Создание прототипов для ключевых пользовательских интерфейсов
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Wireframes created for all core user journeys

tasks.name: Dev Sprint 1
tasks.description: First development sprint for MVP features
tasks.ruDescription: Первый спринт разработки функций MVP
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Sprint goals met, demo conducted, review completed

tasks.name: Dev Sprint 2
tasks.description: Second development sprint for MVP features
tasks.ruDescription: Второй спринт разработки функций MVP
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Sprint goals met, demo conducted, review completed

tasks.name: Data Model Stub
tasks.description: Create initial data model for MVP
tasks.ruDescription: Создание начальной модели данных для MVP
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Essential entities and relationships defined

tasks.name: API Contract Draft
tasks.description: Define API interfaces between components
tasks.ruDescription: Определение API-интерфейсов между компонентами
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: API contract documented in OpenAPI/Swagger format

tasks.name: Security & Privacy Checklist
tasks.description: Review security and privacy requirements
tasks.ruDescription: Обзор требований безопасности и конфиденциальности
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Security and privacy requirements documented and reviewed

tasks.name: Test-Case Catalogue
tasks.description: Define test cases for MVP features
tasks.ruDescription: Определение тестовых сценариев для функций MVP
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Test cases cover all critical functionality

tasks.name: Sprint 3 Development
tasks.description: Third development sprint for MVP features
tasks.ruDescription: Третий спринт разработки функций MVP
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Sprint goals met, demo conducted, review completed

tasks.name: End-to-End QA
tasks.description: Complete quality assurance testing
tasks.ruDescription: Проведение комплексного тестирования качества
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: All critical defects resolved, test results documented

tasks.name: UAT & Metrics
tasks.description: Conduct user acceptance testing and collect metrics
tasks.ruDescription: Проведение приемочного тестирования пользователей и сбор метрик
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: UAT completed with acceptable results, metrics collected

tasks.name: Pilot Roll-out
tasks.description: Deploy MVP to pilot users/environment
tasks.ruDescription: Развертывание MVP для пилотных пользователей/среды
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: MVP successfully deployed to pilot environment

tasks.name: Retrospective & Lessons
tasks.description: Conduct project retrospective and document lessons learned
tasks.ruDescription: Проведение ретроспективы проекта и документирование извлеченных уроков
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Retrospective held, lessons documented, next steps identified

tasks.name: Pilot Feedback Log
tasks.description: Collect and analyze feedback from pilot users
tasks.ruDescription: Сбор и анализ обратной связи от пилотных пользователей
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Feedback collected, analyzed, and prioritized

tasks.name: MVP Rollout Go/No-Go
tasks.description: Make decision on full rollout of MVP
tasks.ruDescription: Принятие решения о полном развертывании MVP
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Go/No-Go decision made with clear criteria

tasks.name: Hyper-care Support Window
tasks.description: Provide intensive support during initial rollout
tasks.ruDescription: Предоставление интенсивной поддержки в период начального развертывания
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Support procedures in place, incidents tracked and resolved

tasks.name: Problem Framing
tasks.description: Define the problem to be solved in the design sprint
tasks.ruDescription: Определение проблемы, которую нужно решить в дизайн-спринте
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Problem statement is clear and agreed by all participants

tasks.name: Expert Ask-Me-Anything
tasks.description: Q&A session with domain experts
tasks.ruDescription: Сессия вопросов и ответов с экспертами в предметной области
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Key insights captured from expert session

tasks.name: Lightning Interviews
tasks.description: Conduct short interviews with stakeholders
tasks.ruDescription: Проведение коротких интервью с заинтересованными сторонами
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: At least 5 stakeholder interviews conducted and documented

tasks.name: Crazy-8 Sketches
tasks.description: Rapid sketching of 8 ideas in 8 minutes
tasks.ruDescription: Быстрое создание 8 идей за 8 минут
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Each participant completes Crazy-8 exercise

tasks.name: Sketch Solutions
tasks.description: Create detailed sketches of potential solutions
tasks.ruDescription: Создание детальных эскизов потенциальных решений
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Each participant produces at least one detailed sketch

tasks.name: Solution Voting Matrix
tasks.description: Vote and prioritize solution sketches
tasks.ruDescription: Голосование и приоритизация эскизов решений
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Voting completed and winning solution identified

tasks.name: Prototype
tasks.description: Build a prototype of the chosen solution
tasks.ruDescription: Создание прототипа выбранного решения
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Working prototype that demonstrates key user flows

tasks.name: Prototype Storyboard
tasks.description: Create storyboard for the prototype
tasks.ruDescription: Создание раскадровки для прототипа
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Storyboard covers all test scenarios

tasks.name: 5-User Test
tasks.description: Test the prototype with 5 users
tasks.ruDescription: Тестирование прототипа с 5 пользователями
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: 5 user tests conducted, results recorded and analyzed

tasks.name: Interview Highlights
tasks.description: Document key insights from user testing
tasks.ruDescription: Документирование ключевых выводов из пользовательского тестирования
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Key insights documented and next steps identified

tasks.name: Accessibility Audit
tasks.description: Evaluate solution against accessibility standards
tasks.ruDescription: Оценка решения на соответствие стандартам доступности
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Solution evaluated against WCAG 2.1 AA standards

tasks.name: Pen-Test Report
tasks.description: Security penetration testing of the solution
tasks.ruDescription: Тестирование безопасности решения на проникновение
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Penetration test completed, findings documented

tasks.name: Release Notes
tasks.description: Prepare release notes for the solution
tasks.ruDescription: Подготовка примечаний к выпуску решения
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Release notes document all features, known issues

tasks.name: Post-Launch Survey
tasks.description: Conduct survey after solution launch
tasks.ruDescription: Проведение опроса после запуска решения
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Survey conducted with at least 20 users

tasks.name: ROI Evaluation
tasks.description: Evaluate return on investment of the solution
tasks.ruDescription: Оценка рентабельности инвестиций в решение
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: ROI analysis completed with actual vs. projected metrics
